title: A Hero's Path - Fantasy Adventure Music
description: A Hero’s Path is a high-quality pack of 13 music tracks (7 looping) composed for use in video games.
longDescription:
A Hero's Path is a game music asset pack with 13 tracks, composed for full orchestra, and is perfect for fantasy, RPG, and adventure games. The pack delivers wonder, epic scale, and a few wholesome moments which set the mood for a beautiful story driven experience, and a call to adventure. 


Pack Preview:

https://youtu.be/zS9lxgnMLL4


TRACKLIST:


  1. Clear Skies [2:04]
  2. Clear Skies (Loop) [0:33]
  3. Dawn [2:49]
  4. Dawn (Loop) [1:15]
  5. Farmers (Loop) [0:46]
  6. Horizons [2:56]
  7. Journeying Forth (Loop) [1:12]
  8. Ride Once More (Loop) [1:00]
  9. Strength in Numbers (Loop) [1:05]
  10. The Citadel in the Sky [3:35]
  11. The Sun Rises [2:29]
  12. The Sun Rises (Loop) [1:08]
  13. Wonders [1:58]


Music Quality:

A Hero’s Path was created with industry-leading software used in professional studios worldwide, each track delivers a polished, high-quality sound, elevating your game to new heights of immersion.


Technical Details:

13 Stereo WAV music tracks (16-bit/44.1kHz)

Bit rate: 1411 kbps

231MB uncompressed

Royalty-Free license


**If you'd like to learn more about Andrew or his ongoing projects, visit andrewchamberscomposer.com
technicalDetails:
